content.question: Which of the following most strongly contributed to the overall trend shown in the table?

choices.label: The growth of a consumer economy centered on production of items for domestic use
Improvements in agricultural productivity and food-distribution capability
Large-scale migration of Europeans to overseas colonies
The spread of Enlightenment ideas concerning the natural sciences

content.answer: Improvements in agricultural productivity and food-distribution capability

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
